example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 住) (PP (P 在) (NP-PN (NR 中坜))))) (DEC 的))) (NP-PN (NR 林鸿桂))) (PU ，) (VP (VP (NP-TMP (NN 早年)) (VP (VV 白手起家))) (PU ，) (VP (PP-MNR (P 靠著) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 卖) (NP-OBJ (NN 冰果))))) (VP (VV 赚) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (QP (CD 不少)) (NP (NN 钱))))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 攒积) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (QP (QP (CD 三) (CLP (-NONE- *RNR*-2))) (PU 、) (QP (CD 四) (CLP-2 (M 栋)))) (NP (NN 房子))))))
